about_the_game:
In the game, you will play as the owner of a small universe that has escaped the "cosmic restart",
Players need to find available props through prompts in the scene, explore the small universe step by step through puzzle solving, and gradually understand the story of each small universe through dialogue with characters or objects, and explore their history and secrets
Little Universe 612 also has a manager - Chuncao
She may know more secrets about this little universe
In the game, you will look for energy, maintain the normal operation of the small world, find the key to explore the space you can't enter, find and discover by exploring, and learn the story before the universe restarts, maybe that will give you some inspiration
In the full version, there will also be features such as combat and space exploration, so stay tuned!
————————————————————————————————————————————————————
What? Low-profile Starfield?
Yun Tianming gives Cheng Xin a star and a small universe. I don't have a star, but I also want to give you a small universe!
After the restart of the universe, a few small universes escaped the collapse, 612 small universe is one of them, unfortunately, you are the only one left in the small universe.
What is the world like there? Are there other microuniverses? Am I the only one given to this little world?
I watched the sunset 44 times that day, and I think the same is true of other small universes?
————————————————————————————————————————————————
The author has gone to the postgraduate entrance examination, and the next update should be the next one!!!
Hope you enjoy our game!!!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: win7/win10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6400
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960 or AMD FX 8320
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: win7/win10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-7700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 6GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
